replies.msg: Bye
你個樣好似綺夢啊

Take me out tonight
Where there's music and there's people
And they're young and alive
Driving in your car
I never never want to go home
Because I haven't got one
Anymore
Take me out tonight
Because I want to see people and I
Want to see life
Driving in your car
Oh, please don't drop me home
Because it's not my home, it's their
Home, and I'm welcome no more
And if a double-decker bus
Crashes into us
To die by your side
Is such a heavenly way to die
And if a ten-ton truck
Kills the both of us
To die by your side
Well, the pleasure - the privilege is mine
Take me out tonight
Take me anywhere, I don't care
I don't care, I don't care
And in the darkened underpass
I thought oh God, my chance has come at last
(but then a strange fear gripped me and I
Just couldn't ask)
Take me out tonight
Oh, take me anywhere, I don't care
I don't care, I don't care
Driving in your car
I never never want to go home
Because I haven't got one, da...
Oh, I haven't got one
And if a double-decker bus
Crashes into us
To die by your side
Is such a heavenly way to die
And if a ten-ton truck
Kills the both of us
To die by your side
Well, the pleasure - the privilege is mine
Oh, there is a light and it never goes out
There is a light and it never goes out
There is a light and it never goes out
There is a light and it never goes out
There is a light and it never goes out
There is a light and it never goes out
There is a light and it never goes out
There is a light and it never goes out
There is a light and it never goes out

replies.msg: 再睇埋你個名

佢本身自己住 單身
有次佢同我講 屋企近排成日唔見野
由細細包既朱古力 去到電腦
都成日係放工返屋企之後唔見左...
果件事困擾左佢好耐 因為屋內其他野仲係整整齊齊
無被翻過既痕跡⋯⋯

表姐當時都懷疑係唔係自己整唔見/有夢遊/失憶症
但係屋入面既物件一件一件咁唔見

佢試過報警 但係又查唔到d咩..
表姐把心一橫自己買左個cam返屋企裝...

裝完cam果個禮拜
表姐間屋無再唔見野
佢翻查過cctv 記錄
的確無人入過屋....

quote.msg:
裝完cam果個禮拜
表姐間屋無再唔見野
佢翻查過cctv 記錄
的確無人入過屋....

replies.msg: Mickey Mouse

正當佢以為件事已經完左果時
有日佢放工
道大門被人用美工刀刻住

「你覺得你可以走得甩？？？？？？？」

佢果時驚到即刻跑去差館
上到佢屋企睇過哂所有野
全部都無被人郁過
Cam記錄都影唔到有人入過佢間屋

有人問佢有冇得罪過人
佢都係答無
事實上佢本身個人就係好和善果種
甚少同人發生爭執...

佢之後係我哋到住左一排
搜查過指模 大門 都無被人格硬開過既痕跡...
佢自己都唔好意思一直住喺我哋到

兩個月段就搬返佢自己屋企....
